title: Trump's Art of the Deal, or Art of the U-Turn?
preview: Trump threatened 8 European countries with tariffs over Greenland.
body:
[Watch Video](https://karat.substack.com/p/trumps-art-of-the-deal-or-art-of)

ğŸ¯ Trump threatened 8 European countries with tariffs over Greenland. Five days later? Gone. This isn't newsâ€”it's a pattern you can predict.

In this video, I break down Trump's decade-long playbook: the three-step reversal dance he's been running since 2018. Once you see it, you can call the next move before it happens.
